code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Problems(){const[entries,setEntries]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{axios.get('https://www.leetbud.com/api/problems',{withCredentials:true}).then(response=>{setEntries(response.data);}).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching data:',error));},[]);const deleteEntry=id=>{axios.delete("https://www.leetbud.com/api/problems/".concat(id),{withCredentials:true}).then(()=>{setEntries(entries.filter(entry=>entry._id!==id));}).catch(error=>console.error('Error deleting entry:',error));};const handleEdit=id=>{navigate("/AddEditProblems/".concat(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto p-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/AddEditProblems",className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Add new Problems"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>window.location.href='https://www.leetbud.com/download-entries',className:"ml-4 bg-indigo-500 hover:bg-indigo-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Download Entries"})]}),Array.isArray(entries)&&entries.length>0?entries.map(entry=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-100 p-4 rounded shadow mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"font-bold text-lg mb-2",children:["Question: ",entry.question_name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded mr-2",onClick:()=>handleEdit(entry._id),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-red-500 hover:bg-red-700 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded",onClick:()=>deleteEntry(entry._id),children:"Delete"})]},entry._id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"No problems found or data is not loaded yet."})]})});}export default Problems;
